overview: Postwar Germany, 1945. Leopold Kessler, an American of German descent, works as a sleeping car conductor for the Zentropa railway line. When he meets Katharina Hartmann, the railroad owner's daughter, and they fall in love, his life intersects with the dark and violent path of a mysterious organization opposed to the United States army military occupation.

production_companies.name: Euroimages Fund of the Council of Europe

tagline: World War II had finished, but it left indelible marks
title: Europa
